entities.name: snitch
entities.description: The Snitch is a golden ball.

entities.name: nimbus two thousand and one
entities.description: Nimbus Two Thousand and One is a broomstick.

relationships.description: Malfoy grabbed hold of the Firebolt's tail, indicating he grasped it.
Madam Hooch screeched and shot up to where Malfoy was sliding back onto his Nimbus Two Thousand and One, indicating Gryffindor received a penalty.
Lee Jordan was howling into the megaphone and dancing out of Professor McGonagall's reach, indicating he danced out of her reach.
The Snitch had disappeared again, which Malfoy had achieved what he wanted to do.
